Ingredients:
  • Cluster Beans - Fresh - 200 gms
  • Oil - 1 tsp
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Urad dal / Skinless black gram - 1 tsp
  • Bengal gram/ Chana dal - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 5 - chopped
  • Peanut ğŸ¥œ powder Â - 4 Tb sp ( click for recipe - Homemade Peanuts ğŸ¥œÂ Powder)
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Water - 150 ml - to cook cluster beans
Procedure: Cooking Cluster Beans:
  • Chop Cluster Beans into 1/2 inch pieces
  • Add in pressure cooker along with salt, water & turmeric powder
  • Cook over medium heat for 2 whistles
  • Turn off eat, let pressure goes off
  • Open lid and keep aside
Process of making Curry:Â 
  • Heat a skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, Chana dal and curry leaves
  • Saute and add cooked cluster beans
  • Mix well and add peanut ğŸ¥œÂ powder
  • Add little amount of water to make the gravy consistency
  • Combine well and cook 10 mins
  • Turn off heat and serve with roti/Â Chapathi
